structured_data.overview: El Segundo | Vision 2050 is a proactive long-term planning initiative to update the city's General Plan Land Use Element, launched in March 2025. The 18-24 month process includes community engagement, workshops, and public hearings to establish a new vision for the city's development.

meetings.title: City Leadership Interviews
meetings.agenda: Interviews with City Council members and executive staff

meetings.title: Community Workshop
meetings.agenda: Presentation of initial existing conditions research and soliciting public input about vision, goals and objectives

meetings.title: Project Kick-off
meetings.agenda: Kick-off meeting with MIG, Inc. to launch El Segundo | Vision 2050

meetings.title: Contract Approval
meetings.agenda: City Council approval of agreement with planning consulting firm MIG, Inc.

documents.title: General Plan Land Use Element (Current)
documents.description: Current General Plan Land Use Element adopted in 1992

signup_info.description: The public can sign up for periodic emails about El Segundo | Vision 2050, including future events, community workshops, and public hearings.
benefits: Receive updates about El Segundo | Vision 2050

structured_data.other_info: El Segundo | Vision 2050 is updating the General Plan Land Use Element which was last comprehensively updated in 1992. The General Plan is a broad, long-range policy document required by California state law that guides future development and conservation. The Land Use Element serves as the blueprint for physical development of the city, containing goals, objectives, policies, and programs, as well as specific development criteria and standards.
